TopicTitle: Craft can't be spawned in Hangar

Articles.Content:
I'm on the verge of fury. My craft can't be opened in the hangar anymore. No crash log either. 

When I pressed Ctrl+Z, game froze for a couple of secs and crashed on me. I can spawn it on the Runway but not in the hangar. 

Used mods are Realism Overhaul, Real Fuels, FAR, AJE, Streyker's Aerospace, Procedural Wings and Parts, TweakScale.

http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=35217637591638238834  Here's the craft.

Has this happened to anyone else?
http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=19111691235846713726 Here's the crash log, found it.
